citation.article-title: Sphingosinicella vermicomposti sp. nov., isolated from vermicompost, and emended description of the genus Sphingosinicella
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Sphingosinicella
Characteristics are the same as given in the original description of the genus Sphingosinicella (Maruyama et al., 2006) and the amended description of the genus described by Geueke et al. (2007).

However, the Î²-peptidyl aminopeptidase activity and the signature nucleotides in the 16S rRNA gene sequence described previously (Geueke et al., 2007) are variable from species to species within the genus Sphingosinicella.
